system:
note description: "Graphical picture stored as a two dimensional map of pixels.%NCan be modified and displayed." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "drawable, primitives, figures, buffer, bitmap, picture" date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
class ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP
inherit ../interface/ev_drawable.xmlEV_DRAWABLE redefine ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_copycopy end
../interface/ev_primitive.xmlEV_PRIMITIVE undefine ../interface/ev_colorizable.xml#f_set_background_colorset_background_color, ../interface/ev_colorizable.xml#f_background_colorbackground_color, ../interface/ev_colorizable.xml#f_set_foreground_colorset_foreground_color, ../interface/ev_colorizable.xml#f_foreground_colorforeground_color, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_copycopy redefine ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_in_default_state_for_tabsis_in_default_state_for_tabs, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation end
../interface/ev_drawable_action_sequences.xmlEV_DRAWABLE_ACTION_SEQUENCES
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_sizemake_with_size, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pointer_stylemake_with_pointer_style, ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer
convert ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pointer_stylemake_with_pointer_style ({../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE}), ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer ({../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER})
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_make_with_size../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_sizemake_with_size (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Create with a_width and a_height. require a_width_positive: a_width > 0 a_height_positive: a_height > 0 do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_sizeset_size (a_width, a_height) ensure then width_assigned: ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width height_assigned: ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
f_make_with_pointer_style../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pointer_stylemake_with_pointer_style (a_pointer_style: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE) -- Create from a_pointer_style. local l_temp: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create l_temp := a_pointer_style if l_temp = Void then create l_temp end ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_init_from_pointer_styleinit_from_pointer_style (l_temp) end
f_make_with_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_make_with_pixel_buffermake_with_pixel_buffer (a_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER) -- Create from a_pixel_buffer. require a_pixel_buffer_not_void: a_pixel_buffer /= Void do ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_init_from_pixel_bufferinit_from_pixel_buffer (a_pixel_buffer) end
feature -- Basic Operations
f_flush../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_flushflush -- Ensure that the appearance of Current is updated on screen -- immediately. Any changes that have not yet been reflected will -- become visible. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_flushflush end
feature -- Comparison
f_is_equal../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (other: like Current): FalseBOOLEAN -- Does other have the same appearance as Current. do if other /= Void then Result := (../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth * other.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight = other.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth * ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight) end end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY} -- Contract support
f_is_in_default_state../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_in_default_stateis_in_default_state: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state? do Result := ../interface/ev_drawable.xml#f_is_in_default_statePrecursor {../interface/ev_drawable.xmlEV_DRAWABLE} and then ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_in_default_state_for_tabsis_in_default_state_for_tabs end
f_is_in_default_state_for_tabs../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_in_default_state_for_tabsis_in_default_state_for_tabs: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current in its default state with regards to tabs? do Result := not ../interface/ev_tab_controlable.xml#f_is_tabable_tois_tabable_to and not ../interface/ev_tab_controlable.xml#f_is_tabable_fromis_tabable_from end
feature {FalseEV_BUILDER} -- Access
f_pixmap_path../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_pathpixmap_path: detachable FalsePATH -- Path of pixmap.
f_pixmap_exists../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists: FalseBOOLEAN -- Does pixmap ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_pathpixmap_path exist?
feature {FalseEV_BUILDER} -- Status setting
f_enable_pixmap_exists../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_enable_pixmap_existsenable_pixmap_exists -- Assign True to ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists. do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists := True ensure pixmap_exists_set: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists end
f_disable_pixmap_exists../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_disable_pixmap_existsdisable_pixmap_exists -- Assign False to ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists. do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists := False ensure pixmap_exists_set: not ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_existspixmap_exists end
f_set_pixmap_path../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_pixmap_pathset_pixmap_path (a_path: like ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_pathpixmap_path) -- Assign a_path to ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_pathpixmap_path. do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_pathpixmap_path := a_path ensure pixmap_path_set: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_pixmap_pathpixmap_path = a_path end
feature -- Status setting
f_set_with_named_path../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_with_named_pathset_with_named_path (a_path: FalsePATH) -- Attempt to load pixmap data from a file specified by file_name. -- May raise Ev_unknown_image_format or Ev_corrupt_image_data -- exceptions. -- See supported_image_formats in EV_ENVIRONMENT for valid file formats. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_path_not_void: a_path /= Void a_pathnot_empty: not a_path.Falseis_empty do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_read_from_named_pathread_from_named_path (a_path) end
f_set_with_named_file../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_with_named_fileset_with_named_file (file_name: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Attempt to load pixmap data from a file specified by file_name. -- May raise Ev_unknown_image_format or Ev_corrupt_image_data -- exceptions. -- See supported_image_formats in EV_ENVIRONMENT for valid file formats. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed file_name_not_void: file_name /= Void file_name_not_empty: not file_name.Falseis_empty do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_with_named_pathset_with_named_path (create {FalsePATH}.Falsemake_from_string (file_name)) end
f_set_size../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_sizeset_size (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign a_width and a_height to ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth and weight. -- Do not stretch image. -- May cause cropping. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_width_positive: a_width > 0 a_height_positive: a_height > 0 do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_set_sizeset_size (a_width, a_height) ensure width_assigned: ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width height_assigned: ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
f_reset_for_buffering../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_reset_for_bufferingreset_for_buffering (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Resets the size of the pixmap without keeping original image or clearing background. -- Useful when reusing Current as a back-buffer for blitting to other drawables. require width_valid: a_width > 0 height_valid: a_height > 0 not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_reset_for_bufferingreset_for_buffering (a_width, a_height) end
f_stretch../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_stretchstretch (a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Assign a_width and a_height to ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth and weight. -- Stretch the image to new size. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_width_positive: a_width > 0 a_height_positive: a_height > 0 do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_stretchstretch (a_width, a_height) ensure width_assigned: ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth = a_width height_assigned: ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight = a_height end
f_set_mask../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_set_maskset_mask (a_mask: ../interface/ev_bitmap.xmlEV_BITMAP) -- set transparency mask of current to a_mask. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed mask_not_void: a_mask /= Void mask_same_dimensions: a_mask.../interface/ev_bitmap.xml#f_widthwidth = ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth and then a_mask.../interface/ev_bitmap.xml#f_heightheight = ../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_set_maskset_mask (a_mask) end
feature -- Duplication
f_save_to_named_path../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_save_to_named_pathsave_to_named_path (a_format: ../interface/ev_graphical_format.xmlEV_GRAPHICAL_FORMAT; a_filepath: FalsePATH) -- Save Current to a_filepath in format a_format. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_format_not_void: a_format /= Void a_filepath_not_void: a_filepath /= Void do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_save_to_named_pathsave_to_named_path (a_format, a_filepath) end
f_save_to_named_file../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_save_to_named_filesave_to_named_file (a_format: ../interface/ev_graphical_format.xmlEV_GRAPHICAL_FORMAT; a_filename: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Save Current to a_filename in format a_format. require not_destroyed: not ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed a_format_not_void: a_format /= Void a_filename_not_void: a_filename /= Void do ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_save_to_named_pathsave_to_named_path (a_format, create {FalsePATH}.Falsemake_from_string (a_filename)) end
f_copy../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_copycopy (other: like Current) -- Update Current to have same appearance as other. -- (So as to satisfy ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal.) do if ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation = Void then ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create end if not other.../interface/ev_any.xml#f_is_destroyedis_destroyed then ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_copy_pixmapcopy_pixmap (other) else ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xml#f_set_sizeset_size (other.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_drawable_i.xml#f_widthwidth, other.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_drawable_i.xml#f_heightheight) ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_destroydestroy end end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../interface/ev_any_handler.xmlEV_ANY_HANDLER} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation: ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmap_i.xmlEV_PIXMAP_I -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_create_implementation../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation -- See {EV_ANY}.create_implementation. do create {../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP} ../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_makemake end

end -- class ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP
